headline: Tell HN: Emulator developer Byuu/Near is probably not dead
description:
Context: https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=27657610

The US State Department recently released finalized figures for US citizens that died overseas in 2021. Source: https://travel.state.gov/content/travel/en/international-travel/while-abroad/death-abroad1/death-statistics.html

According to these figures, no US citizens died in Japan of non-natural causes between the months of June and December 2021, the time Byuu/Near is supposed to have committed suicide. The press articles at the time made no independent confirmation of the suicide, merely repeating claims from a Twitter user and an anonymous Google docs document.

Byuu/Near is probably still alive.
headline_zh-Hans: 告诉HN：模拟器开发商Byuu/Near可能没有死
headline_zh-Hant: 告訴HN：模擬器開發商Byuu/Near可能沒有死
description_zh-Hans:
背景：https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=27657610

美国国务院最近公布了2021年在海外死亡的美国公民的最终数据。来源：https://travel.state.gov/content/travel/en/international-travel/while-abroad/death-abroad1/death-statistics.html

根据这些数字，在2021年6月至12月期间，没有美国公民在日本死于非自然原因，也就是Byuu/Near被认为自杀的时间。当时的媒体文章没有对自杀进行独立确认，只是重复了一个推特用户和一个匿名谷歌文档的说法。

Byuu/Near可能还活着。
description_zh-Hant:
背景：https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=27657610

美國國務院最近公佈了2021年在海外死亡的美國公民的最終數據。來源：https://travel.state.gov/content/travel/en/international-travel/while-abroad/death-abroad1/death-statistics.html

根據這些數字，在2021年6月至12月期間，沒有美國公民在日本死於非自然原因，也就是Byuu/Near被認為自殺的時間。當時的媒體文章沒有對自殺進行獨立確認，只是重複了一個推特用戶和一個匿名谷歌文檔的說法。

Byuu/Near可能還活著。
